discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: {{GENDER:|You}} ni nya buɣisigu so yi niŋ tɔɣino zaŋ chaŋ saawara ŋɔ polo. A ni tooi baŋsi a ni bɔri ni nyari buɣisigu ŋɔ shɛm.
discussiontoolsdebug-intro:
A peegyi ŋa wulee lɛ a [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:N kɔkɔre/yɔlebo:kɔmbodi 
Boma] wuli ka ferebo aŋ a yelteɛbo naŋ be a peegyi '''[[:$1]]'''. F naŋ baŋ nyɛ o la ka o taa tɔnɔ a debaagi yele kyaare neŋ a yɔlebo bee taa pare bambo lɛnɛɛ ona tona. A duoroo na la beebe a  The same information is available in the [[$2|kɔmbodiibubomapeegyiduori API]]
discussiontools-desc: Tuman niɛma ŋan yɛn sɔŋ yɛligi sawara paajinima
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|kɔmbo peegyi]] e la be noba naŋ maŋ di demmo lɛ ba naŋ maale yelzu kyaare {{SITENAME}} lɛ ona naŋ soma. {{GENDER:|fooŋ}} naŋ baŋ de la a peegyi ŋa a piili neŋ demmoneŋ fo taaba lɛnɛɛ fo naŋ na zɛge do  saa [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Noba naŋ be  {{SITENAME}} naŋ baŋ toneŋ la [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|demmo di peegyi]] a toɔle a duori to neɛ zaa {{GENDER:|fooŋ}}, kyɛ fo naŋ nyɛ la leɛ teɛre ma ka ba naŋ e.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Ninvuɣ shɛba ban be {{SITENAME}} nyɛla ban ni tooi zaŋ [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|talk page]] ŋɔ zaŋ bɛ maliniŋnima din yina bɛ IP addresi {{GENDER:|nyini}} n pa pohim zuɣu saha ŋɔ.

Niriba pam IP adreesinima nyɛla din taɣiri saha shɛli kam, ka di tooi zooi ka ninvuɣ' bɔbili mali ŋa. A ni [$1 nam akɔnti] bee [$2 kpɛma[ din yɛn gu ka taɣi saha ŋan kanna nangbankpeeni zaŋ chaŋ ban yi polo. Akɔnti nambu gba nyɛla ŋan sɔŋdi sɔɣiri a IP adreesi.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-tem:
Ninvuɣ shɛba ban be{{SITENAME}} nyɛla ban ni tooi yunsi [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|talk page]] ŋɔ n-ti salo pam satarili {{GENDER:|you}}.

Bahigu, [[{{MediaWiki:tempuser-sɔŋsimyaɣili }}|yaɣili ŋɔ saha nyɛla din yɛn paai]]. A yi bori ni a nyari lahabaya, mini nahingbaŋ shɛŋa  , [$1 nammi akɔunti] bee [$2 kpɛma].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Talk pages]] nyɛ luɣishɛli niriba ni gbaari saawara bɛ ni yɛn niŋ shɛm ka lahabaya din be{{SITENAME}} tooi gaŋdu. Piligimi saawara palli din yɛn che ka a mini niriba tooi laɣim gbaai saawara {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Bɔ {{GENDER:|nyini}} yɛlimi li kpee din yɛn che ka shɛba gba tooi lihi li.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Talk pages]] nyɛla luɣishɛli niriba ni tooi gbaai saawara bɛ ni yɛn niŋ shɛm namm lahabali {{SITENAME}} din nyɛ din gaŋdu ka ni tooi zaŋ tum tuma. Zaŋmi yaɣili ŋɔ piligu saawara gbaabu zaŋ jandi maliniŋ shɛŋa din yina IP addresi ŋɔ ni. Bɔ {{GENDER:|nyini}} a ni yɛlli shɛli kpee nyɛla salo zaa ni tooi nya shɛli. IP addresinima pam nyɛla din taɣiri saha kam ka nyɛ niriba pam ni tooi wuligiri shɛli.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-tem: Zaŋmi ŋɔ [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-temp}}|yɛltɔɣili yaɣili]] piligi saawara gbaabu {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|ni}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]] zaŋ jandi yi ni yɛn niŋ shɛm viɛlligi {{SITENAME}}. Bɔ {{GENDER:|nyini}} a ni yɛn yɛlli shɛli nyɛla salo zaa ni yɛn nya shɛli. Tum [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]] nyɛla [[{{MediaWiki:tempuser-helppage}}|saha bela akɔunti]], yɛltɔɣili yaɣili ŋɔ saha nyɛla din yɛn paai. [[{{MediaWiki:tempuser-helppage}}|Bɔhimi pam]].
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: {{GENDER:|Welcome}} niŋdi a yɛltɔɣa peeji maraaba yaha
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-te: {{PAƔA BEE DOO:|maraba}} paaji shɛli din ku yuui ŋɔ zuɣu
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user: Pilimi saawara ni  {{PAƔA BEE DOO :{{PAAJI YULI}}|ni}} {{PAAJI YULI}}
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: {{GENDER:|Your}} yɛligu ŋɔ bi tooi zaŋ niŋ, dama so dabam gba nyɛla ŋun yɛlli lala saha maa. Pahimi suɣilo labiniŋ yaha, bee ka a labilihi yaɣili maa n nya bahigu yɛligu.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Bi tooi nya yɛligu maa {{GENDER:| a nyɛla}} ŋun labisiri lala yaɣili maa. Di ni tooi nyɛla bɛ yihilimi bee bɛ zaŋlimi labisi yaɣa shɛli dabam.
Pahimi suɣilo {{GENDER:|labilihi}} yaɣili maa ka labiniŋ yaha.
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Bɔhimi pam zaŋ kpa paaji ŋɔ polo
discussiontools-notification-added-topic: Yɛltɔɣ' palli "$4" nammi be $3 zaŋ ti $2.
{{PLURAL:$1|One new topic|$1 new topics|100=99+ new topics}} m-be "$2".
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{PLURAL:$1|One topic was|$1 topics were|100=99+ topics were}} beni bee n-yi $2 ni.
Yɛltɔɣ' kpani "$4" zaa beni bee n-yi.
{{GENDER:|Nyini}} a ku lahi deei lahabaya di yi niŋ ka lala yɛltɔɣili yi soɣi bee yihi.
A ni tooi taɣi ŋɔ [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo-echosubscriptions|a suhiyurim ni ]].
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|Labisiri palli yini|$1 new replies|100=99+ labisiri pala}} din be "$3".
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment: Bahigu sabbu: $1 by $2 din be yɛltɔɣili $3
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-pu: A tɔɣino maa nyɛla din zaŋ wuhi salo
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: A yɛlikpani maa nyɛla din pahi
discussiontools-preference-summary:
A ni tooi bɔhim viɛnyɛla zaŋ chaŋ lala nahiŋgbana polo [https
://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Dimbɔŋɔ nyɛla din yɛn ti a soli ka a tooi deeri satara zaŋ chaŋ niriba ni yɛri shɛli zaŋ chaŋ yɛlikpana kam polo.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Ban {{GENDER#}} a dihitabili ni bɔri ni a ŋmaai a tɔɣino sabbu n-ŋɔ n-Labi?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Ban {{GENDER#}} a dihitabili ni bɔri ni a ŋmaai a yɛlkpani  tɔɣino sabbu n-ŋɔ n-Labi?
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: A ni kpe yɛlkpani ŋɔ puuni ?
Tɔhi niŋ lahibali teeri ŋɔ ni yɛltɔɣishɛŋa din tu ni zaŋ niŋ peeji ŋɔ ni?
Yihimi a maŋa yɛlikpani ŋɔ puuni
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: {{Paɣa bee doo:|bɔ soli kpe}} n-too deeri lahabali zaŋ chaŋ tɔɣino pala polo.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: {{GENDER:|You}} ni nya lahibali zaŋ chaŋ taha shɛɣa yɛltɔɣa zuɣu ŋɔ ni
A ku lahi nya tibili zaŋ chaŋ tɔɣino pala yaha zaŋ kpa bɔhim yaɣili ŋɔ.
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription:
Timi ma tibili di yi niŋ ka so niŋ tɔɣino zaŋ chaŋ yɛlzuɣu shɛli ni n ni be {{GENDER
:|subscribed}} to
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Tɔɣino ŋan be yɛltɔɣa paaji ŋɔ zuɣu pahila maliniŋ puuni
tag-discussiontools-description: Maliniŋ shɛli din niŋ ka di nyɛla saawara tuma niɛma ka bɛ zaŋ niŋ ʋa
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Ŋun.tumdi pahila yɛlikpani palli nti pahi sawara tuma niɛma
